question.title: Find the Index of the Large Integer
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Search in a Sorted Array of Unknown Size", "titleSlug": "search-in-a-sorted-array-of-unknown-size", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Do a binary search over the array, exclude the half of the array that doesn't contain the largest number.
Keep shrinking the search space till it reaches the size of 2 where you can easily determine which one has the largest integer.
